dashboard:
GX Network Status - NOC
AOR
% Route Difference
source="/home/inmarsat/terminal_count.txt" AOR|stats first(pp_tpa) AS ppcount, first(asr1k) AS asr | eval percent=abs(100-(ppcount/asr)*100) | table percent -15m now
% value block 0 ["0x65a637","0xf58f39","0xd93f3c"] [5,10] true true standard absolute auto true PP_TPA vs ASR 1K true search none 60
AOR
% Dropped
source="/home/inmarsat/terminal_count.txt" AOR | stats avg(asr1k) as avasr, first(asr1k) as asdiff | eval drop=round(100-(asdiff/avasr)*100) | eval perdrop= if(drop < 0, 0, drop) | table perdrop -24h@h now
% value block 0 ["0x65a637","0xf58f39","0xd93f3c"] [5,10] true true standard absolute auto true true search none 60
AOR
% State Change
source="/home/inmarsat/terminal_count.txt" AOR earliest=-24h | stats first(EXTRA_FIELD_8) as bounce, avg(asr1k) as avasr| eval percent=((bounce/avasr)*100)| table percent -24h@h now
% value block 0 ["0x65a637","0xf58f39","0xd93f3c"] [5,10] true true standard absolute auto true true search none 60
AOR
% LCs Offline
source="/home/inmarsat/terminal_count.txt" AOR| head 1| stats first(EXTRA_FIELD_9) as active, first(EXTRA_FIELD_11) as failed |eval lcavail=((failed)/(active)*100)|table lcavail -15m now
% value block 0 ["0x65a637","0xf58f39","0xd93f3c"] [5,10] true true standard absolute auto true true search none 60

iNet Processes AOR
source="/home/inmarsat/gsr_inet.csv" inet>100 PP=LL OR WP |eval pp_ag=if(isnull(pp_ag),0,1) | eval pp_acq=if(isnull(pp_acq),0,1) | eval pp_ag_div=if(isnull(pp_ag_div),0,1)| eval pp_cng=if(isnull(pp_cng),0,1)| eval pp_da=if(isnull(pp_da),0,1)| eval pp_iac=if(isnull(pp_iac),0,1)| eval pp_mc=if(isnull(pp_mc),0,1)| eval pp_na=if(isnull(pp_na),0,1) | chart first(pp_ag) as pp_ag first(pp_acq) as pp_acq first(pp_ag_div) as pp_ag_div first(pp_cng) as pp_cng first(pp_da) as pp_da first(pp_iac) as pp_iac first(pp_mc) as pp_mc first(pp_na) as pp_na by inet -60m@m now
ellipsisNone 0 visible collapsed visible linear 1 0 log 0 inherit column 50 10 area connect none 0.01 default shiny all 1 0 ellipsisStart bottom
PP Processes AOR
source="/home/inmarsat/pp_process_count.csv" [search source="/home/inmarsat/sites.csv" LL OR WP | stats first(sas) AS SAS | table SAS ] | eval pp_rt=if(pp_rt>0,1,0) | eval pp_tpa=if(pp_tpa>0,1,0) | eval pp_sr=if(pp_sr>0,1,0) | eval pp_se_proxy=if(pp_se_proxy>0,1,0) | eval pp_tun=if(pp_tun>0,1,0) | chart first(pp_rt) as pp_rt first(pp_tpa) as pp_tpa first(pp_sr) as pp_sr first(pp_se_proxy) as pp_se_proxy first(pp_tun) as pp_tun by server_addr -90m@m now
ellipsisNone 0 visible collapsed visible linear 1 0 log 0 inherit column 50 10 area connect none 0.01 default shiny all 1 0 ellipsisStart bottom

source="/home/inmarsat/gsr_inet.csv" inet>100 PP=BE |eval pp_ag=if(isnull(pp_ag),0,1) | eval pp_acq=if(isnull(pp_acq),0,1) | eval pp_ag_div=if(isnull(pp_ag_div),0,1)| eval pp_cng=if(isnull(pp_cng),0,1)| eval pp_da=if(isnull(pp_da),0,1)| eval pp_iac=if(isnull(pp_iac),0,1)| eval pp_mc=if(isnull(pp_mc),0,1)| eval pp_na=if(isnull(pp_na),0,1) | chart first(pp_ag) as pp_ag first(pp_acq) as pp_acq first(pp_ag_div) as pp_ag_div first(pp_cng) as pp_cng first(pp_da) as pp_da first(pp_iac) as pp_iac first(pp_mc) as pp_mc first(pp_na) as pp_na by inet -60m@m now

source="/home/inmarsat/pp_process_count.csv" BE | eval pp_rt=if(pp_rt>0,1,0) | eval pp_tpa=if(pp_tpa>0,1,0) | eval pp_sr=if(pp_sr>0,1,0) | eval pp_se_proxy=if(pp_se_proxy>0,1,0) | eval pp_tun=if(pp_tun>0,1,0) | chart first(pp_rt) as pp_rt first(pp_tpa) as pp_tpa first(pp_sr) as pp_sr first(pp_se_proxy) as pp_se_proxy first(pp_tun) as pp_tun by server_addr -90m@m now
